2 import os
3 import time

5 
6 class ProgramFileException(Exception):
7  pass
8 
9 
10 class FileAlreadyExistException(ProgramFileException):
11  pass
12 
13 
14 class FileDoesNotExistException(ProgramFileException):
15  pass
16 
17 
18 class ProgramsFileManager(object):
19  associated_path = ""
20 
21  def __init__(self, progs_dir, language, extension, runnable):
22  self._progs_dir = os.path.abspath(os.path.expanduser(progs_dir)) + "/"
23  if not os.path.isdir(self._progs_dir):
24  os.makedirs(self._progs_dir)
25 
26  self._language = language
27  self._runnable = runnable
28 
29  self._extension, self._suffix = self._init_extension_n_suffix(extension)
30 
31  def _init_extension_n_suffix(self, extension):
32  if extension[0] == ".":
33  return extension[1:], extension
34  return extension, "." + self._extension
35 
36  def _name_from_filename(self, filename):
37  if filename.endswith(self._suffix):
38  return filename[:-len(self._suffix)]
39  return filename
40 
41  def _filename_from_name(self, name):
42  return name + self._suffix
43 
44  def _path_from_name(self, name):
45  return self._progs_dir + self._filename_from_name(name)
46 
47  def _read_raw_file(self, name):
48  """
49  Read file
50 
51  :param name: file name
52  :type name: str
53 
54  :raises: ProgramFileException: if any error
55 
56  :return: The file
57  :rtype: str
58  """
59  if not self.exists(name):
60  raise ProgramFileException("File '{}' does not exist".format(name))
61 
62  with open(self._path_from_name(name), 'r') as f:
63  try:
64  return f.read()
65  except Exception as e:
66  raise ProgramFileException("Could not read object '{}' : {}".format(name, e))
67 
68  @staticmethod
69  def _generate_raw_text(code, description):
70  raise NotImplementedError
71 
72  # - Public
73  def create(self, name, code, description, allow_overwrite):
74 
75  if len(name) == 0:
76  name = 'untitled'
77 
78  # Getting path
79  file_path = self._path_from_name(name)
80 
81  if not allow_overwrite and os.path.isfile(file_path):
82  raise FileAlreadyExistException("File already exist and overwrite permission is not given")
83 
84  # Generate raw string
85  file_raw_text = self._generate_raw_text(code, description)
86  # Generating lines which should be written
87  file_lines = file_raw_text.split('\\n')
88  with open(file_path, 'w') as f:
89  try:
90  for file_line in file_lines:
91  f.write(file_line + "\n")
92  except Exception as e:
93  raise ProgramFileException("Could not write program" + str(e))
94 
95  def read(self, name):
96  """
97  Read
98 
99  :param name:
100  :type name: str
101  :return: Code, description
102  :rtype: (str, str)
103  """
104  raise NotImplementedError
105 
106  def get_saved_at(self, name):
107  """
108  Return the modification time of the file
109  :param name: the program's file name
110  :type name: str
111  :return: the modification time of the file
112  :rtype: str
113  """
114  if not self.exists(name):
115  raise ProgramFileException("File '{}' does not exist".format(name))
116 
117  return time.ctime(os.path.getmtime(self._path_from_name(name)))
118 
119  def read_description(self, name):
120  """
121  Read description
122  """
123  return self.read(name)[1]
124 
125  def remove(self, name):
126  """
127  Remove file
128 
129  :param name: file name
130  :type name: str
131  :raises: ProgramFileException: if any error
132 
133  :return: None
134  """
135  try:
136  os.remove(self._path_from_name(name))
137  except OSError as e:
138  raise ProgramFileException("Could not remove object '{}' : {}".format(name, e))
139 
140  def get_all_names(self, with_suffix=False):
141  """
142  Get all filenames available in storage
143 
144  :param with_suffix:
145  :raises: ProgramFileException: if any error
146 
147  :return: list of filenames
148  :rtype: list[str]
149  """
150  try:
151  filenames = sorted(os.listdir(self._progs_dir))
152  except OSError as e:
153  raise ProgramFileException("Could not retrieve files. " + str(e))
154  if with_suffix:
155  return [f for f in filenames if f.endswith(self._suffix)]
156  else:
157  return [self._name_from_filename(f) for f in filenames if f.endswith(self._suffix)]
158 
159  def get_all_names_with_description(self):
160  list_name = self.get_all_names()
161  list_description = [self.read_description(name=n) for n in list_name]
162  return list_name, list_description
163 
164  def get_all_names_with_subdirectory(self):
165  list_ = self.get_all_names(with_suffix=True)
166  return [self.associated_path + name for name in list_]
167 
168  def exists(self, name):
169  """
170  Check if a file with a certain name exists
171 
172  :param name: file name
173  :type name: str
174  :return: True if file exists, else False
175  :rtype: bool
176  """
177  return os.path.isfile(self._path_from_name(name))
178 
179  def execute(self, _name):
180  if self._runnable:
181  return False, "Execution not implemented"
182  else:
183  return False, "Execution not runnable"
184 
185  def stop_execution(self):
186  if self._runnable:
187  return False, "Stop execution not implemented"
188  else:
189  return False, "Execution not runnable, why do you want to stop it ?"
190 
191  @property
192  def runnable(self):
193  return self._runnable
